alert.note: Alert for Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hooker, northern Logan, eastern McPherson, northwestern Custer, southwestern Blaine and southern Thomas Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Halsey to 11 miles northeast of Tryon. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dunning, Halsey, Ringgold, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Linscott and Brown Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 223 and 246. Highway 92 between mile markers 207 and 215. Highway 97 between mile markers 25 and 26, and between mile markers 41 and 43. Highway 83 between mile markers 120 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
